creator: zxp@elanbase.com
text:
Deploying a DBCP connection pool base on 
jdk1.4.1+tomcat5.0+sybase11.9+jconn5.5,but encounter an error when starting 
tomcat server:throw some exceptions and starting Dos window auto closeing.

If tomcat dies on startup - it usually is due to a misconfigured server.xml.
Where the problem could be any of the following:
- server.xml is not a valid xml document (most likely)
- The jar libraries for sybase are in the wrong place.

Since there is no exact cause of a bug (or detail of how to reproduce), I am
marking as INVALID for now. Please use the tomcat-user list to debug this issue
and if there is a bug confirmed, this can reopened.

Also the faq might be helpful for more information (unfortunetely the database
help in it is lacking)
http://tomcatfaq.sourceforge.net/

There is also tomcat-user archives where you can search for more information.
(DBCP config issues appear a lot in the user list) 
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=tomcat-user&r=1&w=2
creator: funkman@joedog.org
